formatDescription: multiArtist is a PC (Windows) program for creating MultiGigaScreen graphics for the ZX Spectrum. It is likely that the four known file extensions (.mg1, .mg2, .mg4 and .mg8) relate to the attribute blocks (8x1, 8x2, 8x4, 8x8) in a given file.
provenanceCompoundName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration

internalSignatures.name: multiArtist File (.mg1)
internalSignatures.note: BOF: 'MGH' then 0x01 (SOH or start of header) then 0x01

internalSignatures.name: multiArtist File (.mg2)
internalSignatures.note: BOF: 'MGH' then 0x01 (SOH or start of header) then 0x02

internalSignatures.name: multiArtist File (.mg4)
internalSignatures.note: BOF: 'MGH' then 0x01 (SOH or start of header) then 0x04

internalSignatures.name: multiArtist File (.mg8)
internalSignatures.note: BOF: 'MGH' then 0x01 (SOH or start of header) then 0x08
